about_the_game:
Welcome aboard Station Haven 3! (DEMO) 

Experience the unique story of the newest crew member aboard the Haven 3.
Explore the Station, find the cassettes left by previous crew members and try to figure out what has happened aboard the Station and where everyone went. But be careful, the Station's age is slowly showing, and it's systems are slowly failing.

Will you be able to find all the clues and find out what has happened?
Will you be able to fix the Station and all it's problems?
